title: Study of a Sleeping Child
credit_line: Gift in memory of Mr. and Mrs. George Magee Wyckoff from Mr. and Mrs. Frederic L. Cook, Mr. and Mrs. N. Barry Durfee, Jr., and Mr. and Mrs. George M. Wyckoff, Jr.
provenance_text: Mr. and Mrs. George Magee Wyckoff; Mrs. Frederic L. Cook, their daughter, Sewickley, PA. Gift to Museum, 1976.
